name: HACKED (itch) (Todi)
description:
I highly recommend playing the game in full screen for a better experience!!

You are trying to beat you record in a game, but the #1 of game is trying to hack your pc to you dont win.

Your mission is simple, dont be hacked and reach the #1 of game.

CONTROLS

Space - Interact with characters.

w,a,s,d - Move

Mouse - Aim.

E - ULT.

Q - Drink potions.

How not being hacked:

Dowload: In random times a download will start, stop the download before it completes, just press in X button.

Hacked Console: Click on the skull as many times as it appears on top of it before time runs out.

If you pc health reach 0 you got HACKED!
